overview.name: Japar Sidik
overview.title: Fullstack Developer
overview.headline: From Santri to Worlds
overview.description: I am a Fullstack Developer with a passion for creating dynamic and responsive web applications. I specialize in both frontend and backend development, ensuring a seamless user experience and robust functionality.

skills.name: PHP
skills.description: Proficient in PHP for server-side scripting, with experience in building RESTful APIs and web applications.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Proficient in JavaScript, including ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, and modern frameworks.

skills.name: React
skills.description: Experienced in building user interfaces with React, utilizing hooks, context API, and state management libraries.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Skilled in server-side development with Node.js, including RESTful API  development and database integration.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: Expert in CSS, including Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design techniques.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: Proficient in HTML5, semantic markup, and accessibility standards.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: Familiar with TypeScript for building scalable and maintainable applications.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: Experienced in version control with Git, including branching, merging, and pull requests.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Knowledgeable in Python for scripting and automation tasks, with experience in data analysis and machine learning.

skills.name: Linux
skills.description: Familiar with Linux command line, shell scripting, and system administration tasks.

skills.name: SQL
skills.description: Knowledgeable in SQL for database management and querying.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: Familiar with MongoDB for NoSQL database solutions, including CRUD operations and aggregation.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects.

projects.name: Mujawwad Rhythm Classifier
projects.description: A deep learning model to classify Qur'anic recitation rhythm using LSTM. This project is also for finishing my undergraduate thesis. Motivated by my education as a Santri (Islamic boarding school student) and my interest in Technology.

projects.name: Discord TTS Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot that converts text to speech using Google TTS API or ElevenLabs API (for more rich voices), allowing users to listen to messages in voice channels. This bot also powered by AI chat capabilities.

projects.name: Dotfiles
projects.description: A repository of my personal dotfiles, including configurations for Zsh, Git, and Chezmoi. This project is a part of my journey in customizing my development environment.

projects.name: GRUB Theme - VTuber Edition (Airani Iofifteen)
projects.description: A custom GRUB theme featuring Airani Iofifteen, a VTuber from Hololive Indonesia.

projects.name: Boedin Chat Frontend
projects.description: A WebSocket-based chat frontend built with React + Vite and powered by Shadcn/ui. This project is part of open-source collaboration project in IMPHNEN Community.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using modern technologies such as React, Node.js, and PHP. Collaborating with clients to deliver high-quality software solutions.
